companyInfo.name: Sweet Treats Donuts
companyInfo.description: Your one-stop shop for the freshest and most delicious donuts in town!

menu.name: Classic Glazed
menu.description: A timeless favorite, light and fluffy with a sweet glaze.

menu.name: Chocolate Frosted
menu.description: Deliciously rich chocolate frosting on a soft donut.

menu.name: Maple Bacon
menu.description: Sweet maple glaze topped with crispy bacon bits.

menu.name: Sprinkle Delight
menu.description: A colorful treat with rainbow sprinkles on top.

menu.name: Boston Cream
menu.description: Filled with creamy custard and topped with chocolate.

faqs.question: What are your store hours?
faqs.answer: We are open Monday to Saturday from 7 AM to 7 PM and Sunday from 8 AM to 5 PM.

faqs.question: Do you offer gluten-free options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a selection of gluten-free donuts. Please check our menu or ask our staff for details.

faqs.question: Can I place an order for a large event?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can place custom orders for events. Please contact us at least 48 hours in advance.

faqs.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Yes! Sign up for our loyalty program and earn points for every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and mobile payment options.

greeting.text: Welcome to Sweet Treats Donuts! How can I help you today?
options: Do you have any specials today?
